Text: follow your leader (shoot yourself in the head)
Racial "purity" leads to inbreeding. See how well it worked for the British royal family (heamophilia) and the jews (Tay-Sachs).

Funny, some folks I talk to who are WP look upon the Hebrew Semitic people as a culture and not as a race.  It makes me wonder if they can justify hatred of white people based on their varied cultural practices, and if so, is the term 'racist' anachronistic?

Either way, it's all balderdash - like arguing with a Christian or Hebrew or *.religion, trying to understand the fervour that drives fanaticism of any sort is bound to release a mess of fallacious and circular logic.  The root of all evil isn't money, it's laziness.  And hateful people are too damn lazy to do the intellectual work it takes to understand differences.

Eat a bag of cocks, Flakey.
it's not flakey, it's flaccy - as in flaccid (limp, soft), or so I imagine. Good luck with building yourself up by hating others, flaccy. Even it it worked, you'd still be inadequate.
